paper_abstract: BUILDING CORRECT, EFFICIENT SYSTEMS THAT REASON ABOUT THE APPROXIMATIONS PRODUCED BY SENSORS, MACHINE LEARNING, BIG DATA, HUMANS, AND APPROXIMATE HARDWARE AND SOFTWARE REQUIRES NEW STANDARDS AND ABSTRACTIONS. THE UNCERTAIN < T > SOFTWARE ABSTRACTION AIMS TO TACKLE THESE PERVASIVE CORRECTNESS, OPTIMIZATION, AND PROGRAMMABILITY PROBLEMS AND GUIDE HARDWARE AND SOFTWARE DESIGNERS IN PRODUCING ESTIMATES.
paper_title: UNCERTAIN < T >: ABSTRACTIONS FOR UNCERTAIN HARDWARE AND SOFTWARE
